attributes.action: introduce regulations that restrict the Travel Industry overcharging during School holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During all school holidays, the travel industry increase prices and restrict many people from being able to take a holiday. If the government was to introduce legislation that stopped this from happening many people would be able to take a vacation within the school holidays.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
